column5: Based on what I've been reading, and the weather forecast for the week, I'm hoping there will still be some ice fishing on the Easter weekend in the Minden/Carnarvon/Dorset corridor.  Any updates on the ice conditions would be much appreciated.
Tons of ice. Just got back.
Saw a couple of trucks out on the ice at Miners bay today - plenty of ice still
Sweet, looks like an Easter trip to the cottage is in order-thanks!
def lots of ice in minden.. i was all over kashiwigagmog... lots of good ice..  Might be no snow left by then though  ( hard on sleds)
we were on 30" just south of there yesterday
last year at this time, the ice had been out for almost a week on Gull, this year, we will be ice fishing on the easter weekend, pretty crazy
Last year was a crazy year, this is normal. I"ve icefished easter many times in that area.  S.
ill be out in hali this weekend.. one more try!
